Lets face it PERIOD Stony Brook is not a college town PERIOD Then again most schools renowned for their science and math programs are not making the Princeton Review list of party schools PERIOD But the issue here is not just curriculum PERIOD The infrastructure for such a prospect simply is not there PERIOD
